metadata.Title: CVE-2015-2929 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
The Hidden Service (HS) client implementation in Tor before 0.2.4.27,0.2.5.x before 0.2.5.12, and 0.2.6.x before 0.2.6.7 allows remote serversto cause a denial of service (assertion failure and application exit) via amalformed HS descriptor.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-2929` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

tor - 0.2.6.10-1
tor-geoipdb - 0.2.6.10-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tor package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.2.6.10-1').
